question: Which Indian company in partnership with the Skylo announced the world’s first satellite based Narrow Band Internet of Things network in the country?
explanation: BSNL in partnership with the Skylo announced the world’s first satellite based Narrow Band Internet of Things network in India. This is to bring a breakthrough in satellite based narrowband internet of things technology. It will also help in in achieving the targets of Digital India mission helping farmers, fishermen, meaning, construction and Logistic Enterprises in India.
